sentence.Network_en: As to the ideological work, we should never go about impetuously.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于思想工作, 千万不可操切从事.

sentence.Network_en: So of course I dashed impetuously to the shrine to pay homage.
sentence.Network_cn: 一听这话,我当然性急地冲到这个神殿来表示敬意.

sentence.Network_en: He escaped impetuously, like the wolf who finds his cage open.
sentence.Network_cn: 他象一头狼,看见笼门开了,总要慌忙出逃.
